channel.title: Hosting, please help
channel.description: :mad:alright, so ive posted this before, but dident really get the answer i was looking for. so the problem is that i KNOW for sure the port i want is open , but everytime i run a server on my laptop , i can not connect from my ip, HOW ever when i run a sever off my parents desktop , its works with no issues, ive ran a series of tests and they all come bad the same, saying the port is open . . . any help would be nice, i have team viewer , and n00bs that say "oh just stick to playing severs" can smd this is the help section and i wanna know why i cant host on the damn laptop. thanks :) - thefuck :cool:

item.title: Hosting, please help
item.dc:creator: @thefuck thefuck
item.description:

:mad:alright, so ive posted this before, but dident really get the answer i was looking for. so the problem is that i KNOW for sure the port i want is open , but everytime i run a server on my laptop , i can not connect from my ip, HOW ever when i run a sever off my parents desktop , its works with no issues, ive ran a series of tests and they all come bad the same, saying the port is open . . . any help would be nice, i have team viewer , and n00bs that say “oh just stick to playing severs” can smd this is the help section and i wanna know why i cant host on the damn laptop. thanks - thefuck
